usage.cn: 总是需要一些温暖。哪怕是一点点自以为是的纪念。
usage.eng: Always needs warm some. Even if is the commemoration which thinks oneself infallible little.

usage.cn: 很多人不需要再见，因为只是路过而已。遗忘就是我们给彼此最好的纪念
usage.eng: We don't need to meet again for we are just passers by.To forget is the best commemoration for each other.
